title: Daveis
author: Daveis
content: I would need a loan 50 euro crypto paying back 68 euro on 1st July, add me on discord so we can chat.Add me on discord and see if we find a way to trust me.  I can send info on who I am and logs from someone else who is loaning me and trusts me.  Cheers from Iceland.Kalista <34#4688

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: Daveis on June 23, 2023, 04:15:40 PMAdd me on discord and see if we find a way to trust me.  I can send info on who I am and logs from someone else who is loaning me and trusts me.  Cheers from Iceland.The only way anyone will be able to believe you is if you bring a valid collateral.No collateral, no loan

comments.author: gordonics.com
comments.body: Can you use an escrow service to protect this transaction?You are a newbie so collateral is mandatory.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: It's now almost 1st July, I hope you did not die because you couldn't secure the loan. You have a higher chance of getting help from friends and family rather than from a forum where you just registered, and your first post was about getting a no collateral loan.
